fields.name: CAPITA KAZU KOKUBO PRO 157 2021
fields.summary: A HIGH-PERFORMANCE BOARD FOR THE BIG MOUNTAIN FREESTYLER
fields.details: The Kazu Kobuko Pro is quick, manoeuvrable, and it will slash the backcountry like none other. While many great powder boards are large and surfy, the Kazu Kokubo Pro has a compact chassis with a powder nose and high-end construction components.

fields.name: GNU LADIES CHOICE 148.5 2021
fields.summary: JAMIE ANDERSON'S ALL-MOUNTAIN FREESTYLE CHOICE WITH A PREMIUM ECO-BALANCE
fields.details: The Ladies Choice is a reflection of Jamie Anderson’s positive self, supporting all efforts she makes to push the progression of snowboarding. Whether it be podium-topping, jaw-dropping manoeuvres in the park, hard ripping in the resort or taking on new frontiers in the backcountry. Hand-built in the USA at the world’s most environmental-friendly board factory, the Ladies Choice is produced with quality craftsmanship and conscience in line with Jamie’s unreal eco-ethos at Mervin MFG.

fields.name: BURTON FELIX STEP ON 2021
fields.summary: THE STIFF ALL-MOUNTAIN BOOT FOR BURTON'S STEP ON® SYSTEM
fields.details: The perfect match: The Burton Felix Step On® boot, specially developed for women, combines comfort and practicality at a high level. DRYRIDE™ Heat Cycle™ Lining and the added warmth of the Sleeping Bag heat-reflective foil defies arctic blasts. Total Comfort delivers a broken-in feel right out of the box and the Power UP tongue keeps the entire package quick and nimble, enhancing rebound for consistent mid-range flex that won’t break down. A boot that leaves nothing to be desired.

fields.name: DOUCHEBAGS THE SKI BAG
fields.summary: THE NEXT GENERATION OF SKI BAGS - THE DOUCHEBAG
fields.details: Developed as a collaboration between skiers, snowboarders, surfers, designers, engineers and airport baggage handlers as well as the Norwegian University of Science and Technology, the Douchebag skibag is the fusion of passion and needs. It's the smart way to transport your skis and snowboards. It has a length adjustment system for transport your gear without the well-known banana shape. Furthermore the Douchebag is fully collapsible and weighs only 3,4 kg without renounce on protection cause of the 19 separate ABS ribs in combination with selected, durable materials. With it's innovative shoulder carrying and the hook-up system it provides perfect comfort when you're on tour, even you carry around the weight of the whole Alps!

fields.name: ANON RELAPSE CRAZY BLACK + MFI
fields.summary: THE ANON RELAPSE JR. GOGGLE WITH INCLUDED MFI® FACEMASK, OFFERS OPTIMAL WARMTH AND STYLE FOR ALL WEATHER CONDITIONS
fields.details: The Anon Relapse Junior Goggle features Magnetic Facemask Integration (MFI®), which lets you connect your Anon MFI face mask to the goggle with a simple click. The cylindrical lens technology offers a maximum field of view.

fields.name: LURKING CLASS GAS STATION BEANIE
fields.details: The Lurking Class Gas Station Beanie comes with a logo embroidery on the back and a logo-skull that hides. Don't be afraid, the Gas Station Beanie has got your back.

fields.name: ICETOOLS WEB LEASH
fields.summary: LEASH WITH HIGHLY ELASTIC BELT STRAP AND CLIP FASTENER
fields.details:
Never let your board go for a ride without you!
Check out the Web Leash by Icetools and enjoy some surf feeling on the hill.

fields.name: DAKINE MODULAR MAT STOMP PAD
fields.summary: THE ULTIMATE ANTI-SLIP PAD FOR YOUR SNOWBOARD
fields.details: The Dakine Modular Mat is the ultimate anti-slip pad for your snowboard. It consists of a three-part set, which you can attach to the board as best suited for you and your foot position. The pads are self-adhesive, so simply peel off the foil and press the Modular Mat firmly to the snowboard! The little knobs of the Dakine anti-slip mat give you the extra strong grip on the snowboard.

fields.name: SALOMON QUEST PRO 100 CRUISE 2021 SKI BOOTS
fields.summary: BEST ALPINE PERFORMANCE FOR ADVANCED SKIERS - THE SALOMON QUEST PRO CRUISE 100
fields.details: The Salomon Quest Pro Cruise 100 is a great alpine ski boot for advanced level skiers. Thanks to the revolutionary Endofit tongue, the QST Pro 100 offers a better fit and better downhill/walking characteristics than any other ski boot in its category. The Hike and Ride technology make it easy to walk to the lift, the heat moldable liner can be perfectly adapted to any foot shape.

fields.name: MARKER GRIFFON 13 ID 120MM SKI BINDINGS
fields.details: The Marker Griffon is one of the most versatile freestyle/freeride bindings on the market. The Griffon is suitable for most skiers thanks to its wide DIN range and excellent performance. The centered swing weight and compact design makes the Griffon 13 ID ideal for freestyle moves of all kinds.

fields.name: SEASON 110-140 TELESCOPIC POLES
fields.summary: ADJUSTABLE SKI POLES FOR POWDER AND BACKCOUNTRY
fields.details: Telescopic poles are sold in pairs.

fields.name: UNION SCOTT STEVENS 2021
fields.summary: THE UNION SCOTT STEVENS PRO - AN EXCELLENT CHOICE FOR THE STREETS AND THE PARK
fields.details: The Union Scott Stevens Pro binding is based on the Union Contact binding and comes with a mid-soft flexing pattern. This design offers a very comfortable and playful feel - ideal for park and urban riding. This binding provides minimal binding-to-board contact points for less interference with your board’s true flexing pattern.
